title: The Eternal Club - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Contracts   Cunning Protagonist   Hackers   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Organizations   Time Manipulation
author: My Name Is Yu   我姓俞
description:
Lu Li spent years slogging his guts out in Shanghai without achieving anything or seeing any hope for the future...He didn't want his life to remain like this. He wanted to become an influential figure with money, power and women, but...but he was merely just another ordinary man on the street!

One rainy night, Lu Li attained a special ability. He could now buy years of life from people and sell these years to others. He could speed up and slow down any amount of time anytime he wanted.

And so, Lu Li began his journey, defying the laws of nature and changing multitudes of lives as he climbed his way up to greatness. He was going to create the most exclusive and premium club in the world - The Eternal Club!>
